## CÃ¡c thay Ä‘á»•i Ä‘Ã£ thá»±c hiá»‡n:

### 1. **AdminLayout.jsx**:
- **Sá»­a sidebar positioning**: Loáº¡i bá» `lg:relative lg:z-10` vÃ  `x` animation Ä‘á»ƒ sidebar luÃ´n fixed trÃªn desktop
- **Cáº­p nháº­t main content margin**: Thay Ä‘á»•i tá»« `lg:ml-0` thÃ nh responsive margin dá»±a trÃªn tráº¡ng thÃ¡i sidebar
- **ThÃªm minWidth style**: Äáº£m báº£o sidebar luÃ´n cÃ³ width tá»‘i thiá»ƒu 80px khi collapsed

### 2. **TongQuan.jsx**:
- **Loáº¡i bá» margin-left**: XÃ³a `ml-0 lg:ml-28` vÃ¬ layout Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Æ°á»£c xá»­ lÃ½ á»Ÿ AdminLayout

## Káº¿t quáº£:

âœ… **Sidebar luÃ´n hiá»ƒn thá»‹ trÃªn desktop** (width 80px khi collapsed, 320px khi expanded)  
âœ… **Main content tá»± Ä‘á»™ng Ä‘iá»u chá»‰nh margin** Ä‘á»ƒ khÃ´ng bá»‹ che khuáº¥t  
âœ… **Mobile responsive** váº«n hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng bÃ¬nh thÆ°á»ng vá»›i overlay  
âœ… **Hover animation** váº«n mÆ°á»£t mÃ  khi expand/collapse

---

---

CÃ³ váº» nhÆ° Ä‘Ã£ Ä‘Æ°á»£c sá»­a rá»“i. BÃ¢y giá» hÃ£y test xem cÃ¡c thay Ä‘á»•i cÃ³ hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng khÃ´ng:

---

```bash
cd DoAnTuyenSinh && npm run dev
```

---

## âœ… **ÄÃ£ kháº¯c phá»¥c váº¥n Ä‘á» chuyá»ƒn hÆ°á»›ng Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p!**

### ğŸ”§ **CÃ¡c thay Ä‘á»•i Ä‘Ã£ thá»±c hiá»‡n:**

#### 1. **ThÃªm Loading State vÃ o UserContext**:
```jsx
const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); // ThÃªm loading state
```

#### 2. **Cáº£i thiá»‡n useEffect trong UserContext**:
- Loáº¡i bá» dependency `[userId]` Ä‘á»ƒ trÃ¡nh infinite loop
- ThÃªm `setIsLoading(false)` sau khi kiá»ƒm tra xong localStorage
- Logging chi tiáº¿t Ä‘á»ƒ debug

#### 3. **Cáº­p nháº­t AdminProtectedRoute**:
```jsx
// Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ loading spinner khi Ä‘ang kiá»ƒm tra authentication
if (isLoading) {
  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
      <div className="text-center">
        <div className="w-16 h-16 border-4 border-blue-500 border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin"></div>
        <p>Äang kiá»ƒm tra phiÃªn Ä‘Äƒng nháº­p...</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

#### 4. **Cáº­p nháº­t cÃ¡c function login/logout**:
- ThÃªm `setIsLoading(false)` trong `login()`, `loginDemo()`, vÃ  `logout()`
- Äáº£m báº£o loading state Ä‘Æ°á»£c reset Ä‘Ãºng cÃ¡ch

### ğŸ¯ **CÃ¡ch hoáº¡t Ä‘á»™ng:**

1. **Khi app khá»Ÿi Ä‘á»™ng**: `isLoading = true`
2. **UserContext kiá»ƒm tra localStorage**: Restore session náº¿u cÃ³
3. **Sau khi kiá»ƒm tra xong**: `setIsLoading(false)`
4. **AdminProtectedRoute**: 
   - Náº¿u `isLoading = true` â†’ Hiá»ƒn thá»‹ spinner
   - Náº¿u `isLoading = false` â†’ Kiá»ƒm tra authentication vÃ  redirect náº¿u cáº§n

### ğŸš€ **Káº¿t quáº£:**

âœ… **KhÃ´ng cÃ²n bá»‹ redirect vá» login khi reload trang**
